mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_vip_level_user ( user_id, type_id, current_level, expire_time, creator_id, circle_id, version ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{typeId}, #{currentLevel}, #{expireTime} #{creatorId}, #{circleId}, #{version} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE current_level = VALUES(current_level), expire_time = VALUES(expire_time)
